targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.system.os.global.cpu.total.total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: mean)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "metricName", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.system.os.global.memory.total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: mean)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "metricName", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.system.os.global.memory.available")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: mean)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "metricName", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.jvm.memory.heap.max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: mean)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "metricName", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.jvm.memory.heap.init")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: mean)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "metricName", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.jvm.memory.heap.used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: mean)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "metricName", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.networking.connections.current")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: mean)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "metricName", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.cluster.nodes.count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: mean)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "metricName", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /com\.hivemq\.system\.os\.network-interface(.+)bytes-received/)
    |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_field"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: max)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / ${intervalSeconds}.0 }))
    |> difference(nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /com\.hivemq\.system\.os\.network-interface(.+)bytes-sent/)
    |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "metricName", "_field"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: max)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / ${intervalSeconds}.0 }))
    |> difference(nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /com\.hivemq\.system\.os\.disks(.+)read\.bytes/)
    |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "metricName", "_field"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: max)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / ${intervalSeconds}.0 }))
    |> difference(nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /com\.hivemq\.system\.os\.disks(.+)write\.bytes/)

    |> aggregateWindow(every: ${intervalSeconds}s, fn: max)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / ${intervalSeconds}.0 }))
    |> difference(nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "com.hivemq.messages.queued.count")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "metricName", "_field"])
